content.text: Match ends, Almería 0, Espanyol 0.

Foul by Raúl Rodríguez (Espanyol).
Attempt missed. Thievy (Espanyol) right footed shot from the centre of the box is close, but misses the top right corner. Assisted by Álex Fernández with a cross.
